page.title: 05EDUCATION HINTON ON GREEN
page.content: Rachel aged 13 lives at Hinton on the Green. At 07.50 she goes to Bredon Hill Middle School by bicycle and bus arriving at 08.20. After an 08.30 assembly, lessons begin at 09.00.She learns Geography, French, Art, English, Science, Religion, Music, Mathematics, History, Games, and craft. Homework is 2 subjects per night.Bredon has 16 teachers and 360 pupils.Rachels uniform is a grey skirt navy blazer,green jumper,green and white tie and a white blouse.Rachel enjoys reading -she is a school librarian- hockey, athletics and music.Bredon has an outdoor swimming pool, 10 computers, a television and a video recorder. Rachel has been on school trips such as ice skating, to Barry Island and has taken part in school plays and musicals. She finishes school at 15.15.
